tgt_original: 心如青蠅，於不淨中起淨想故；

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa pratyarthikasadṛśaṃ vividhakāraṇâkaraṇatayā /  cittaṃ hi ojohārayakṣasadṛśaṃ sadā vivaragaveṣaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 心如債主，生苦楚故； 心如惡鬼，求人便故； 心常高下，貪、瞋逼故；

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa śabdârāmaṃ saṃgrāmabherīsadṛśaṃ /  cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhârāmaṃ varāhêvâśucimadhye /
tgt_original: 心常貪聲，如戰鼓響； 心常貪香，如猪樂廁； 心常貪味，如駝愛蜜；

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśârāmaṃ makṣikêva tailapātre /
tgt_original: 心常貪觸，如蠅著油。 「善男子！

src_original: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /  yan na labhyate tan nôpalabhyate /  yan nôpalabhyate tan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是求於心相而不可得，若不可得則非過去、現在、未來；

src_original: yan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /  yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nêvâsti na nâstîty ādi //
tgt_original: 若非過去、現在、未來則出三世；
